context_bundle.summary: Ansible: Agentless automation tool for configuration management, app deployment, orchestration. YAML playbooks define tasks, inventory file lists hosts, modules perform actions (apt, yum, copy, service, docker_container). Idempotent: Re-running safe (doesn't duplicate changes). SSH-based (no agent required), push model (vs Puppet/Chef pull). Playbook structure: hosts, vars, tasks (name, module, params), handlers (triggered by notify). Roles for reusability. Ansible Galaxy for community roles. Use cases: Server provisioning, app deployment, config updates, multi-tier orchestrations. Best practices: Use roles, vaults for secrets (ansible-vault), tags for selective execution, check mode (--check dry-run), idempotent tasks.

onboarding.quick_start: Ansible basics: Install: pip install ansible. Inventory (hosts.ini): [webservers]; web1.example.com; web2.example.com; [databases]; db1.example.com. Playbook (site.yml): - hosts: webservers; become: yes; tasks: - name: Install nginx; apt: name=nginx state=present; - name: Start nginx; service: name=nginx state=started enabled=yes; - name: Copy config; copy: src=nginx.conf dest=/etc/nginx/nginx.conf; notify: Reload nginx; handlers: - name: Reload nginx; service: name=nginx state=reloaded. Run: ansible-playbook -i hosts.ini site.yml. Ad-hoc commands: ansible webservers -i hosts.ini -m ping; ansible webservers -a 'uptime'; ansible all -m apt -a 'name=vim state=present' --become. Variables: vars: nginx_port: 80; task uses: {{ nginx_port }}. Roles (site.yml): roles: - nginx - mysql. Vault (encrypt secrets): ansible-vault create secrets.yml; ansible-playbook site.yml --ask-vault-pass. Tags: tasks tagged deploy: ansible-playbook site.yml --tags deploy. Check mode (dry-run): ansible-playbook site.yml --check.
common_patterns: Install package: - name: Install Docker; apt: name=docker.io state=present update_cache=yes; become: yes
Copy file: - name: Deploy app config; copy: src=files/app.conf dest=/etc/app/app.conf owner=root group=root mode='0644'; notify: Restart app
Start service: - name: Ensure PostgreSQL running; service: name=postgresql state=started enabled=yes
Run command: - name: Run migration; command: python manage.py migrate; args: chdir: /opt/myapp
Docker container: - name: Run web container; docker_container: name=web image=nginx:latest ports: ['80:80']; state=started
Variables in playbook: vars: app_version: 1.2.3; app_port: 8080; tasks: - name: Deploy app; copy: src=app-{{ app_version }}.jar dest=/opt/app.jar
Handlers (triggered by notify): handlers: - name: Restart nginx; service: name=nginx state=restarted; tasks: - copy: ...; notify: Restart nginx
Roles structure: roles/nginx/tasks/main.yml: - name: Install nginx; apt: name=nginx; roles/nginx/handlers/main.yml: - name: Restart nginx; service: name=nginx state=restarted
Vault encrypt: ansible-vault encrypt secrets.yml; ansible-vault view secrets.yml; ansible-vault edit secrets.yml
Conditionals: - name: Install on Debian; apt: name=nginx; when: ansible_os_family == 'Debian'
